item.title: GPT-Dante
item.description:
This is the official repository for the graphical interface for text generation with the GePpeTto language model, specialized in texts in Dantean rhyme. The interface allows the user to enter a query, to which the model responds in Dante’s writing style. The interface and the GPT-Dante model were developed and used for the following outreach activities:

  • Workshop “Computational Linguistics and Digital Philology in the Age of AI” (Bright Night, Pisa, September 29, 2023)
  • Workshop “Is it Dante or not Dante? That is the question” (Festival della Scienza, Genoa, October 27–29, 2021)
